_sText:
This is the updated version of breakfloor_falls.
---
Added more lighting
Stronger blocks
All players face the other teams spawn
Pit is not as long
---
This is based on Tstar's Breakfloor. Idea goes to Tstar.

This is like breakfloor except theres a pit so you don't die. When your in the pit you can shoot the blocks and make the opposing team fall. Watch out as other people will fall and kill you.

The Maximum players is 44. That means there are 22 spawn points in each spawn. I recommend 24 players in all so the blocks aren't gone so fast.

Screen shot A those are the 2 spawns. The map is A LOT brighter than that.

Screen shot B is the pit.

- Conch
